## Pre Work

- Install [latest](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download) version of RStudio
- Download and install Git from <https://git-scm.com/downloads>.
- Download and install GitHub Desktop from <https://desktop.github.com>.

:::


## Overview

This workshop is designed for those who want learn how use Git and GitHub.
